00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_time.h"
00031 
00032 /*
00033    Tick Range: 0 ~ 2^32 / HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ (maximum tick time)
00034    Interrupt Time: _HTCFG_TIME_OVERFLOW_VALUE / (HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ * HTCFG_TIME_MULTIPLE) Second (not apply for BFTM)
00035 
00036   Example: 32-bit BFTM with 48 MHz Timer Clock
00037     HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ = HTCFG_TIME_CLKSRC = 48000000
00038     Tick Range: 0 ~ 2^32 / 48000000 = 0 ~ 89.478485 Second (maximum tick time, return to 0 every 89.478485 Second)
00039     BFTM do not use interrupt
00040 
00041   Example: 16-bit SCTM with 1 us tick
00042     HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ = 1000000 (Hz)
00043     HTCFG_TIME_MULTIPLE = 1 (1 Timer Count = 1 Tick)
00044     Tick Range: 0 ~ 2^32 / 1000000 = 0 ~ 4294 Second = 0 ~ 71.58 Minute (maximum tick time, return to 0 every 71.58 Minute)
00045     Interrupt Time: 65536 / (1000000 * 1) = 65.536 ms (Trigger interrupt every 65.536 ms)
00046 
00047   Example: 16-bit SCTM with 10 us tick
00048     HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ = 100000 (Hz)
00049     HTCFG_TIME_MULTIPLE = 4 (4 Timer Count = 1 Tick)
00050     Tick Range: 0 ~ 2^32 / 100000 = 0 ~ 42949 Second = 0 ~ 715.82 Minute = 11.93 Hour (maximum tick time, return to 0 every 11.93 Hour)
00051     Interrupt Time: 65536 / (100000 * 4) = 163.84 ms (Trigger interrupt every 163.84 ms)
00052 
00053   Example: 16-bit GPTM with 1 ms tick
00054     HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ = 1000 (Hz)
00055     HTCFG_TIME_MULTIPLE = 4 (4 Timer Count = 1 Tick)
00056     Tick Range: 0 ~ 2^32 / 1000 = 0 ~ 4294967 Second = 0 ~ 49.7 Day (maximum tick time, return to 0 every 49.7 Day)
00057     Interrupt Time: 65536 / (1000 * 4) = 16.384 Second (Trigger interrupt every 16.384 Second)
00058 */
00059 
00060 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061 #define _HTCFG_TIME_CKCU_PCLK                     STRCAT2(CKCU_PCLK_, HTCFG_TIME_IPN)
00062 
00063 #if (IS_IPN_TM(HTCFG_TIME_IPN))
00064 // SCTM/PWM/GPTM/MCTM
00065 #define _HTCFG_TIME_IRQn                          STRCAT2(HTCFG_TIME_IPN, _IRQn)
00066 #define _HTCFG_TIME_IRQHandler                    STRCAT2(HTCFG_TIME_IPN, _IRQHandler)
00067 #define _HTCFG_TIME_CLKDIV                        (HTCFG_TIME_CLKSRC / HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ / HTCFG_TIME_MULTIPLE)
00068 #define _HTCFG_TIME_OVERFLOW_VALUE                (65536) // 16-bit = 2^16
00069 
00070 #if (_HTCFG_TIME_CLKDIV <= 0)
00071   #error "_HTCFG_TIME_CLKDIV is not correct (must >= 1)!"
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 #if (_HTCFG_TIME_CLKDIV > 65536)
00075   #error "_HTCFG_TIME_CLKDIV is not correct (must <= 65536)!"
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 #if ((_HTCFG_TIME_CLKDIV * HTCFG_TIME_MULTIPLE) != (HTCFG_TIME_CLKSRC / HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ))
00079   #error "_HTCFG_TIME_CLKDIV is not correct (must be integer)!"
00080 #endif
00081 #endif
00082 
00083 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00084 #if (IS_IPN_TM(HTCFG_TIME_IPN))
00085 u32 gTotalTick = 0x00000000;
00086 u8 gIsTimeInt = FALSE;
00087 #endif
00088 
00089 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00090 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00091   * @brief  Time Init function.
00092   * @retval None
00093   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00094 void Time_Init(void)
00095 {
00096   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00097     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00098     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_TIME_IPN = 1;
00099     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00100   }
00101 
00102   #if (LIBCFG_CKCU_NO_APB_PRESCALER == 0)
00103   CKCU_SetPeripPrescaler(_HTCFG_TIME_CKCU_PCLK, (CKCU_APBCLKPRE_TypeDef)HTCFG_TIME_PCLK_DIV);
00104   #endif
00105 
00106   #if (IS_IPN_TM(HTCFG_TIME_IPN))
00107 
00108   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00109     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00110        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00111        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00112     */
00113     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00114 
00115     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = _HTCFG_TIME_CLKDIV - 1;
00116     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = _HTCFG_TIME_OVERFLOW_VALUE -1;
00117     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00118     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00119     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00120     TM_TimeBaseInit(_HTCFG_TIME_PORT, &TimeBaseInit);
00121 
00122     /* Clear Update Event Interrupt flag since the "TM_TimeBaseInit()" writes the UEV1G bit                 */
00123     TM_ClearFlag(_HTCFG_TIME_PORT, TM_FLAG_UEV);
00124   }
00125 
00126   /* Enable Update Event interrupt                                                                          */
00127   TM_IntConfig(_HTCFG_TIME_PORT, TM_INT_UEV, ENABLE);
00128   NVIC_EnableIRQ(_HTCFG_TIME_IRQn);
00129 
00130   TM_SetCounter(_HTCFG_TIME_PORT, 0x0000);
00131   TM_Cmd(_HTCFG_TIME_PORT, ENABLE);
00132 
00133   #else
00134 
00135   BFTM_SetCounter(_HTCFG_TIME_PORT, 0x00000000);
00136   BFTM_EnaCmd(_HTCFG_TIME_PORT, ENABLE);
00137   #endif
00138 }
00139 
00140 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00141   * @brief  Time delay function.
00142   * @param  uDelayTick: Delay count based on tick.
00143   * @retval None
00144   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00145 void Time_Delay(u32 uDelayTick)
00146 {
00147   u32 uCurrent;
00148   u32 uStart = Time_GetTick();
00149 
00150   do
00151   {
00152     uCurrent = Time_GetTick();
00153   } while (TIME_TICKDIFF(uStart, uCurrent) < uDelayTick);
00154 }
00155 
00156 #if (IS_IPN_TM(HTCFG_TIME_IPN))
00157 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00158   * @brief  Gets the current time tick.
00159   * @retval Time Tick
00160   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00161 u32 Time_GetTick(void)
00162 {
00163   u32 uCount = GET_CNT();
00164 
00165   if (gIsTimeInt == TRUE)
00166   {
00167     gIsTimeInt = FALSE;
00168     uCount = GET_CNT();
00169     gTotalTick += (_HTCFG_TIME_OVERFLOW_VALUE / HTCFG_TIME_MULTIPLE);
00170   }
00171 
00172   return (gTotalTick + (uCount / HTCFG_TIME_MULTIPLE));
00173 }
00174 
00175 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00176  * @brief   This function handles Timer interrupt.
00177  * @retval  None
00178  ************************************************************************************************************/
00179 void _HTCFG_TIME_IRQHandler(void)
00180 {
00181   TM_ClearFlag(_HTCFG_TIME_PORT, TM_INT_UEV);
00182 
00183   gIsTimeInt = TRUE;
00184 }
00185 #endif
